name: Paywalled
body:
# Description Downloads paywalled html source to a local temp file, then opens it in the user's default browser. Depending on how the site is paywalled, should bypass the paywall protection. # Usage * If using the python version of the code in src/: 
python paywalled.py paywalled_url
* To use the GUI version, run: 
python gui_pay.py
* If using the windows executable version of the code in dist/, just enter the url into the GUI that opens. * To display help message: 
python paywalled.py --help
* If you are behind a network proxy: 
python paywalled.py paywalled_url --proxy proxy_url
# Using the executable in dist/ * This exe is provided for convenience purposes and may not necessarily kept up to date with the latest code additions. # Requirements * requests # Disclaimer * This package was written as a proof of concept and thus should not be used by anyone ever. Author takes no responsibility for effects of using this script.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
